text: how does one cope with this know if you
can ever really cope with it i think
maybe time is something that will help
but i think what makes us so tragic is
just the loss of such innocent lives
I have two children
it's just
I have no words I just go and it I feel
like we all lost our children we did
says angels angels taken away or what
it's very hard you know me and my
husband we have four children and you
know we imagine what they're going
through you know our heart breaks for
them and they're all strangers you
know we're all very small towns
everybody knows each other we're we're
all neighbors and I just felt like I had
to do something I had to get out and
just mourn with everybody else it's not
something that you can just wake up and
it's gone something that lives with you
it's just really a big burden it's just
so unfair these kids had a whole life
ahead of them and to have this taken
away from them it just it's unfathomable
you just have to pray no answers no
clues we just got to be here for each
other and be here
those that we know we lost
one day a time
